name: Cuby Land
description:
Welcome to "Cuby Land: Seasons".

The "Cuby Land: Seasons" is a new, free and addictive game for someone who is patient and wants to climbup on the LeaderBoard.

How to play:
Playing "Cuby Land: Seasons" is simple. Touch anywhere on the screen to jump (or double jump) the Cuby Character. Avoid the enemies or your character will explode and the game will be over!

Includes:
- 4 worlds endless worlds (summer, autumn, winter, spring).
- In every new world the score increased.
- 20 Characters (Mr Cubo, Mrs Cubo, Morpheus, Artist, Trinity, Haker, Spy, MC Cuby, Kalisi, Anarchist, Mr Lova Lova, Cuba Lady, Viking, Super Cube, Ancient Warrior, Pirate, Snow Cube, Ghost, Ninja, Cubot).
- Each character is more strong form previous.
- Battle your friends score with Game Center.
- Free download (with in app purchase for removing ads).

Powered by WC Games:
http://wc-games.com

Developed by Automon:
http://automon.gr

Graphics by MadPixel:
http://madpixel.gr

Music by Popof Lab:
http://popoflab.com
